title: Study skills: take that test
creator_credit: James Novack and Alfred Higgins Productions
brief_description: Follows a classroom of students as they discover how to successfully take a test. Shows importance of not falling behind in studies; reviewing material; best approaches to take toward specific formats in which test questions are presented; most productive use of time alloted for the test.
